      • copyBytes

        public static final void copyBytes(java.io.DataInput in,
                                   java.io.DataOutput out,
                                   int length,
                                   byte[] buf)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Copies the specified number of bytes from the given DataInput to the given DataOutput.
        Parameters:
        in - the DataInput to read from.
        out - the DataOutput to write to.
        length - the number of bytes to copy.
        buf - the buffer to use. Must be of length BUF_LEN.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
